description: Migrate your dragon from our Solana collection (see weblink) to create an elastic supply squeeze on 2 networks! Get Infinity-Forecast utility for holders. Ethos : At the dawn of eternity, the Infinity Serpents are taking over the Bitcoin network to finally achieve their ultimate purpose : Become Immortal. These are the Bitcoin Immortal Dragons, the first-of-their-kind.
name: Bitcoin Immortal Dragons
